divs: Sighting DetailsI had just went out on my back deck to smoke.It gets dark here around 5:30 and this was after 7 so it was already dark outside.I was looking at all the airplanes in the sky(I live near an airport so they are bountiful around here)and out of the corner of my eye,I caught a very bright disc-shaped object to the right of the sky.When I caught sight of it, it was so bright and traveling so fast, I knew it wasn't a plane.It went northeast in a straight completely horizontal line and almost instantly, it was poof, gone.It totally disappeared.I watched for about 7 seconds total.I stood outside and searched the skies for about 5 more minutes, hoping it would return.I felt such an overwhelming feeling of awe and awareness...I have always believed without proof...and now I have it.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Johnson City
There were no other sightings in Johnson City on or around January 15th 2010
